entry.title: $2399 // Spacious 2 Bed w// Dishwasher Right Off the M Train // Prime Bushwick
entry.content:
This is a Spacious 2 bedroom railroad in prime Bushwick!

The apartment features original detail like
- A dishwasher for easy clean up!
- Tons of windows allowing for plenty of natural light!
- Only 1 block from Maria Hernandez Park and a very short walk to both the Jefferson and Morgan L trains!!
- You'll be in the heart of Bushwick's best restaurants, bars, cafes, and shopping such as - Artichoke Pizza, The Johnsons, Hi Hello Diner, Three Door Diamond, Lot 45, The Bushwick Collective, House of Yes, AP Cafe, Faro, and so much more!!
- NO BROKER FEE!
- First and Security to Move
- Bring your Pups and Cats!


Text or Email for fastest response - show contact info!

See you there!
